Description: Steatite scarab. Face carved with design of seated sphinx wearing double crown above neb sign, ankh in front.
Findspot: Excavated/Findspot: Thebes (historic - Greece), Geometric period tomb
Curator's comments: Smith, C. 1887. Acquisitions of British Museum. The Classical Review 1: 316-317 Boehlau, J. 1888. Böotische Vasen. Jahrbuch des Kaiserlich Deutschen Archäologischen Instituts II, 325-364.
